articles.title: World Court Rules States Have Obligation to Cut Emissions
articles.description: The International Court of Justice ruled that states are obligated to reduce greenhouse gas emissions to protect Earth's climate, and failing to do so may violate international law.

articles.title: Trump Administration to Strip EPA of Power to Combat Climate Crisis
articles.description: The Trump administration has drafted a plan to rescind the EPA's authority to regulate greenhouse gas emissions, aiming to overturn the 2009 endangerment finding.
